Posts.Content: On Jan 28, 2010 7:12 PM Claudia413 wrote: On Jan 17, 2010 5:40 PM FL33498 wrote: Does anyone know who is the best doctor in Moffitt Cancer Center breast cancer program. South Florida patient, Breast cancer, er positive, finished surgery and cheom, taking Tamoxifen, but petscan show a 1.3 cm pulmonary nodule, suspicious for tumor Need Help finding the  best doctor! I'm also in South Florida, but on east coast, and I am not familiar with the doctors at Moffitt.  I have a friend up in that general area who goes to Moffitt, and I will contact her and find out who her doctor is.  She has said he's good. Claudia Thank you for the help. Let me know when you get the Doctor's name
